bug.summary: CORS issue on Interactive matcher explorer
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>

The issue is persistent on any browser, device, OS, ... Is this a known issue? <denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10230606/85676635-12e58400-b6c7-11ea-8d61-4805b596e3f0.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: MacOS, Windows Browser: Any
